scripts.db:setup: psql -U postgres -p 2025 -d giu_foodtruck -f connectors/scripts.sql && psql -U postgres -p 2025 -d giu_foodtruck -f connectors/seed.sql
scripts.db:reset: psql -U postgres -p 2025 -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS giu_foodtruck;" && psql -U postgres -p 2025 -c "CREATE DATABASE giu_foodtruck;" && npm run db:setup
scripts.db:create-sessions: psql -U postgres -p 2025 -d giu_foodtruck -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS foodtruck.sessions CASCADE; CREATE TABLE foodtruck.sessions (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, userid INTEGER REFERENCES foodtruck.users(userid) ON DELETE CASCADE, token TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, expiresat TIMESTAMP DEFAULT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '1 day')); CREATE INDEX idx_sessions_token ON foodtruck.sessions(token); CREATE INDEX idx_sessions_expiresat ON foodtruck.sessions(expiresat);"
